rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with automatic sliding doors and a ramp for wheelchair access.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Lively living space featuring vibrant bohemian decor, large windows providing ample natural light, and an open layout that integrates seamlessly with the garden view.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room; features a glass partition for privacy while maintaining visual connectivity with the garden.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen designed for ease of movement and wheelchair accessibility. Features a central island with adjustable height counters.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Compact room for laundry and storage; positioned near the kitchen.

openings.description: Large entrance door with automatic sliding mechanism and a wheelchair ramp.
Large windows for optimal natural lighting, adhering to Vastu guidelines by positioning them in the north and east directions.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom; designed in a bohemian style, featuring an adjoining balcony with garden views.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy secondary bedroom that offers ample natural light and integrates Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom with a focus on tranquility and space for relaxation; includes built-in wardrobes to maximize storage space.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Ensuite)
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible en-suite bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom; features modern fixtures and grab bars.

openings.description: Spacious staircase with a wheelchair ramp integrated for safe access between floors.
Large window providing natural light and garden views, in accordance with Vastu principles by aligning on the east side.
